name: Space Warehouse
description:
Made for Ludum Dare 42 - Running out of space.

Buy items by dragging them from the ship to your platform. You can rotate by pressing any key.

Ships will only buy the item that is in the "Buying" window.

Asteroids can destroy your platform. Watch out! Anything in the warning zone will be destroyed.

Watch out for a visit from the Empire, they will be coming to use your space as well.
